seo_keywords: Shark ZU62 brush roll hair wrap

problems.title: Hard to Push / Suction too strong
solution_steps: Twist the 'Suction Release' collar on the handle to open the vent (reduce suction).
Switch to 'Carpet' mode (brushroll on) to help movement.

problems.title: Dust Cup Latch Broken
problems.description: The bottom door of the dust cup won't stay closed.
solution_steps: The latch is not replaceable individually.
You need a new dust cup assembly.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the suction on a Navigator Pet Pro (ZU62)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement filter or seal typically costs significantly less than a new $568 vacuum, and extending the life of your Shark is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Navigator Pet Pro (ZU62) needs a new filter or seal?
faqs.answer: Common signs include reduced performance and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the filter or seal on my Navigator Pet Pro (ZU62) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
